languages.text: Надышавшиеся газом офицеры не в силах подняться с колен даже для того, чтобы покинуть смертельную ловушку. Кто-то мельтешит во мраке, слышны нестройные команды резать двери плазмо-пилами. Когда путь свободен и выжившие покидают ловушку, на полу остаются десятки мертвых людей.

traits.locale_text: Надышавшиеся газом офицеры не в силах подняться с колен даже для того, чтобы покинуть смертельную ловушку. Кто-то мельтешит во мраке, слышны нестройные команды резать двери плазмо-пилами. Когда путь свободен и выжившие покидают ловушку, на полу остаются десятки мертвых людей.

languages.text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.
languages.original_text: Надышавшиеся газом офицеры не в силах подняться с колен даже для того, чтобы покинуть смертельную ловушку. Кто-то мельтешит во мраке, слышны нестройные команды резать двери плазмо-пилами. Когда путь свободен и выжившие покидают ловушку, на полу остаются десятки мертвых людей.

traits.locale_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even it means escaping the deathtrap. Shapes are darting back and forth in the dark, some uncoordinated voices are commanding to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave behind dozens of dead bodies.

The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even it means escaping the deathtrap. Shapes are darting back and forth in the dark, some uncoordinated voices are commanding to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave behind dozens of dead bodies.

The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

languages.text: Los oficiales, con los pulmones llenos de gas, no tienen fuerzas como para escapar de la trampa mortal. Formas borrosas corren por la oscuridad y un clamor de voces ordena abrir las puertas con sopletes de plasma. Cuando el camino queda libre y los supervivientes salen de la trampa, dejan atrás numerosos cadáveres.
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

traits.locale_text: Los oficiales, con los pulmones llenos de gas, no tienen fuerzas como para escapar de la trampa mortal. Formas borrosas corren por la oscuridad y un clamor de voces ordena abrir las puertas con sopletes de plasma. Cuando el camino queda libre y los supervivientes salen de la trampa, dejan atrás numerosos cadáveres.

languages.text: 军官们的肺里充满了毒气，根本没有力气站起来，甚至连逃出生天的力气都没有。许多人影在黑暗中攒动，还有人高喊着，命令船员们用等离子切割器破坏大门。当出路终于打开，幸存者们逃出去的时候，他们身后留下了几十具尸体。
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

traits.locale_text: 军官们的肺里充满了毒气，根本没有力气站起来，甚至连逃出生天的力气都没有。许多人影在黑暗中攒动，还有人高喊着，命令船员们用等离子切割器破坏大门。当出路终于打开，幸存者们逃出去的时候，他们身后留下了几十具尸体。

languages.text: 士官達は肺にガスが充満して、死の罠から逃れようにも立ち上がる力がない。暗闇の中で影が前後にふらふら動く中で、プラズマカッターで扉を突き破れと命令する鋭い声が響く。道が開いて、生存者が罠から出る。そこには数十人の死体が残されていた。
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

traits.locale_text: 士官達は肺にガスが充満して、死の罠から逃れようにも立ち上がる力がない。暗闇の中で影が前後にふらふら動く中で、プラズマカッターで扉を突き破れと命令する鋭い声が響く。道が開いて、生存者が罠から出る。そこには数十人の死体が残されていた。

languages.text: Die Offiziere, deren Lungen voller Gas sind, haben nicht einmal die Kraft, aufzustehen, um der Todesfalle zu entkommen. In der Dunkelheit huschen Gestalten hin und her, während dröhnende Stimmen Befehle geben, die Türen mit Plasmaschneidern zu durchbrechen. Als sich der Weg freimacht und die Überlebenden die Falle verlassen, lassen sie Dutzende von Leichen zurück.
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

languages.text: Les poumons remplis de gaz, les officiers n'ont plus la force de se lever, même pour échapper à ce piège mortel. Des silhouettes courent en tout sens dans l'obscurité pendant que des voix retentissantes donnent l'ordre d'ouvrir les portes à l'aide de découpeurs à plasma. Lorsque la voie est enfin libre et que les survivants quittent le pont, ils laissent des dizaines de cadavres derrière eux.
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

traits.locale_text: Les poumons remplis de gaz, les officiers n'ont plus la force de se lever, même pour échapper à ce piège mortel. Des silhouettes courent en tout sens dans l'obscurité pendant que des voix retentissantes donnent l'ordre d'ouvrir les portes à l'aide de découpeurs à plasma. Lorsque la voie est enfin libre et que les survivants quittent le pont, ils laissent des dizaines de cadavres derrière eux.

languages.text: Ciğerleri gaz dolu olan subayların, ölüm tuzağından kaçmak için dahi ayağa kalkacak güçleri kalmamış. Silüetler karanlıkta ileri geri fırlarken birbiri üstüne binen sesler, plazma kesicilerle kapıları yarma emri veriyor. Yol açılıp hayatta kalanlar tuzaktan çıktığında, arkalarında onlarca ceset bıraktıkları görülüyor.
languages.original_text: The officers, their lungs full of gas, do not have the strength to stand up even to escape the death trap. Shapes dart back and forth in the dark while clashing voices give commands to tear through the doors with plasma cutters. When the way clears and the survivors leave the trap, they leave dozens of dead bodies behind them.

traits.locale_text: Ciğerleri gaz dolu olan subayların, ölüm tuzağından kaçmak için dahi ayağa kalkacak güçleri kalmamış. Silüetler karanlıkta ileri geri fırlarken birbiri üstüne binen sesler, plazma kesicilerle kapıları yarma emri veriyor. Yol açılıp hayatta kalanlar tuzaktan çıktığında, arkalarında düzinelerce ceset bıraktıkları görülüyor.
